'''''Where Once There Was a Calculation Array''''' is part of the {{Quest|Chronicler of the Crumbling City}}.

==Steps==
# Clear the [[Abyss]]al corrosion in this area
#* Defeat the enemies accosting the [[Secret Source Servant]]: {{Enemy List|Rockfond Rifthound Whelp*2}}
#* Follow the Secret Source Servant
#* Defeat the enemies near the [[Secret Source Dragon Idol]]: {{Enemy List|Rockfond Rifthound Whelp*3}}
#* Use the [[#Tutorial|Secret Source Beam Cannon]] to destroy the [[Oozing Core]]s

==Gameplay Notes==
* The Secret Source Beam Cannon destroys Oozing Cores in an AoE on hit, and it will not run out of ammunition.
* Completing this quest rewards 1 Precious Chest, 1 Exquisite Chest, and 1 Common Chest.
